name: Vic Davis
text: Was good made to order and came out pretty quickly. Didn’t rate 5 star due to no hot and ready. Also the person in the back seemed to have a problem with making the sausage stuff crust pizza and came from the back telling the cashier that …More

name: Ratan Sethi
text:
They really aren’t “hot and ready” as advertised... (therefore they have received a 4/5 stars. Overall... I usually get the deep dish pepperoni and/or stuffed crust pepperoni pizza and it comes out fresh
within 10-12 mins... fast service!

name: John L. Davis
text: I wanted to give this place a better rating because the pizza tasted great and the young lady at the counter was friendly.   But, I watched the slovenly man make my food and witnessed him brush his long black bangs out of his eyes with the …More

name: Happy Helper
text: Very slow service. I try to adjust expectations based on pricing but these folks are chronically underprepared and the majority have a poor demeanor. I understand being busy certainly but I’ve been ignored at the drive through several …More

name: Vicky Rawes
text: Went in for a pizza, was informed they couldn't take cards and only had $4.50 on me. The cook saw my sons disappointment and offered a dollar (so sweet) and the guy at the register refused to comp the pepperoni (since it was their system down) we left without an apology. Wego there several times a week, but I'll reconsider next time.

name: Alex Williams
text: The food is very good, but the service is terrible. The person who helped me was essentially hiding at the back of the store on her phone and was on it most of the time while helping me. When I brought to her attention that she gave me the …More

name: Sergio Exposito
text: Great pizza for just $5. Service could be better though.

name: Marcie Kay
text: Great Pizza at a great price!  Finally tried the pizza at the new location of Little Caesar's on Route 424.  The pizza was really good and the service staff was fast and frielndly.  What more can you ask for.  I'll be back!  I'll try the wings on the next visit.

name: Anne Kee
text: Pizza is always hot and tasty but the drive thru is always slooow. If there are 4-5 cars in front of you, expect to be in line for 30 minutes. They don't have enough Hot N Ready pizzas prepared on Fridays and Saturdays so you sit and wait.

name: Alice Canavan
text: The pizza and the deals are excellent, but they are under staffed, and obviously need more help.

name: Jair Reyes
text: Great and quick service. The employees where kind and quick.

name: william T Session mandley
text: My nephew works there first time I've been to this location and I loved it

name: Jerry Bernacchia
text:
Great deals and cool
drive-through

name: Lance
text: I got 10 pizzas dor a party.  I called ahead and requested a time.  I had to wait about 10 minutes.

name: SHAWN SCHNEIDER
text: Cheap pie the kids love

name: S Orcutt
text: One pizza and no crazy bread ready. Pathetic.

name: _ CkCarruth
text: Slow service, no manners

name: Gina P
text: This location is now closed.

name: PEETE Krugg
text: Allways add a special topping and the pizza is ready in short time.

name: Robert Surratt
text: GREAT PIZZA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! GREAT SERVICE!!!!!! The people here rock!!!!!!!!
